book.synopsis: This book is a complete translation of the fragments of the pre-Socratic philosophers given in the fifth edition of Diels, Fragmente der Vorsokratiker.
book.title_long: Ancilla to Pre-Socratic Philosophers: A Complete Translation of the Fragments in Diels, Fragmente der Vorsokratiker
book.dimensions: Height: 8.25 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 0.440924524 Pounds, Width: 0.43 Inches
